H0.text: Which global confectioner started its business in 1920 making 'gummibärchen'. Haribo

H1.text: Which global confectioner started its business in 1920 making 'gummibärchen'. Ferrero

H2.text: Which global confectioner started its business in 1920 making 'gummibärchen'. Perfetti Van Melle

H3.text: Which global confectioner started its business in 1920 making 'gummibärchen'. Maoam

A4.text: The company created the first gummy candy in 1922 in the form of little gummy bears called Gummibärchen.

A5.text: Maoam was launched in Germany in 1931.

A6.text: Ferrero (company) is an Italian manufacturer of chocolate.

A7.text: Perfetti Van Melle was formed in 2001 of the merger of the Italian-based company Perfetti SpA and the Dutch-based company Van Melle NV.
